description: Monitoring Dashboard for Debezium MySQL connector.

options.content:
# Debezium MySQL Connector Metrics

The Debezium MySQL connector has three metric types:

* snapshot metrics

* streaming metrics

* schema history metrics

For more detailed informarion about the metrics please visit the Debezium documentation page

[Click here to visit](https://debezium.io/documentation/reference/stable/connectors/mysql.html#mysql-monitoring)

panels.title: Number Of  Not Well Formed Transactions

options.content:
# Schema Changes Metrics

For a detailed explanation of all the schema changes metrics: Visit the [Debezium documentation](https://debezium.io/documentation/reference/stable/connectors/mysql.html#mysql-schema-history-metrics)
